body:
Hi Peter,

As Mostapha correctly guessed, this was the result of you having a very new Ladybug_Ladybug component with an old Indoor Radiant Temperature Map component.  I have updated your file to have all of the most recent components and you can find it attached.  I have since put a compatibility check into the Indoor Radiant Temperature map component that will check to be sure that you have the right version of Ladybug_Ladybug flying.

-Chris
